import json
import requests


messages = [
    {"role": "system", "content": "This is a test prompt."},
    {"role": "user", "content": "Just Say Hello."},
    {"role": "assistant", "content": "Hello"},
    {"role": "user", "content": "Thank you."}
]


url = 'https://api.talkbot.ir/v1/chat/completions'


payload = json.dumps({
    "model": "deepseek-reasoner",
    "messages": messages,
    "max-token": 4000,
    "temperature": 0.3,
    "stream": False,
    "top_p": 1.0,
    "frequency_penalty": 0.0,
    "presence_penalty": 0.0
})


headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer sk-a789834145201421ag635554213v8'  # Replace with your actual API key
}


response = requests.post(url, data=payload, headers=headers)


if response.ok:
    print(response.text)
else:
    print(f'An error occurred: {response.text}')

# You may want to parse the JSON response 
data = response.json()

const express = require("express"),
      axios = require("axios");
const app = express();

const DEEPSEEK_API_URL = "https://api.deepseek.com/v1/chat/completions";

});
app.listen(3000, () => console.log("Relay Server Running"));
